wikipedia_page.main: Sir Peter Froggatt  (12 June 1928 − 3 May 2020) was a Northern Irish epidemiologist and academic. He served as Vice-Chancellor of the Queen's University, Belfast between 1976 and 1986.He was the son of Albert Victor Froggatt and Edith Curran. He was educated at Royal Belfast Academical Institution, the Royal School, Armagh and Trinity College, Dublin.

response: **Peter Froggatt, 91, Northern Irish academic administrator and epidemiologist.
